alert.note: Alert for Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 09 at 9:11PM MST until March 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON THURSDAY TO 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. * WHERE...Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass. * WHEN...From noon Thursday to 5 AM MST Friday. The heaviest snow will fall late Thursday afternoon through Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Low temperatures dropping into the single digits Thursday night, with wind chill readings as low as 10 degrees below zero.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for New Mexico can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, 1-800-432-4269, or visiting nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass
